name: CCF Package
desc: This ship has been overhauled with the Command and Control Frigate Package; Increases the command point recovery rate by %s and extends the ship's peak operating time by %s; Package functions only if it is the flagship.
short: Increases command point recovery rate, peak time, and CR degrades more slowly; when on flagship.

name: Structural Modifications
desc: Some time in the past, internal reinforcement and basic plating was removed to make way for added ship capabilities, jepordizing structural integrity. Hull integrity reduced by %s and armor rating reduced by %s.

name: Drone Hanger
desc:
A single %s has been installed instead. 

While unable to service manned fighters, the hanger is optimized to launch and refit drone wings. Due to the relatively small required hanger space, drone refit time increasd by %s. By being limited to only drones, ship replacement rate decreases %s slower and recovers $s faster.

name: Missile Cells
desc: By storing missiles internally in cells, as opposed to being exposed, missile capacity has been increased by %s and missile fire rate increased by %s. As a result of the configuration, the system is %s.
